name: Paper Roll Desk Organizer
description: Upcycle cardboard rolls into a cute desk organizer.
instructions: Cut cardboard into a base shape (circle or rectangle).
Stand toilet rolls upright and glue them onto the base.
Paint or decorate as desired.
Let dry and fill with pens or brushes!

name: Mason Jar Candle Holder
description: A rustic candle holder using a mason jar.
instructions: Paint or frost the mason jar.
Wrap twine around the rim in a bow.
Place candle inside and enjoy the cozy vibe!

name: Button Art Canvas
description: Turn random buttons into beautiful wall art.
instructions: Lightly sketch a shape on the canvas (heart, letter, etc.).
Glue buttons along the outline.
Fill in the inside with layered buttons.

name: Simple Macrame Keychain
description: Create a trendy knotted keychain.
instructions: Fold cords and attach to keyring using a lark's head knot.
Create a series of square knots.
Trim and brush the ends for fringe.

name: Wine Cork Coasters
description: Recycled wine corks make durable coasters.
instructions: Cut corks in half lengthwise.
Arrange in a circle or square and glue together.
Wrap with ribbon for clean edges.

name: Fabric Scrap Bookmarks
description: Quick bookmarks using leftover fabric.
instructions: Cut fabric scraps into rectangles.
Glue ribbon along the top as a pull tab.
Let dry and enjoy reading!

name: DIY Photo Magnets
description: Personalize your fridge with mini photo magnets!
instructions: Cut photos to your desired size.
Optional: Laminate for durability.
Attach magnet to back and press down firmly.

name: T-Shirt Tote Bag
description: No-waste tote made from an old shirt.
instructions: Cut off the sleeves and collar.
Turn inside out and sew or glue the bottom shut.
Turn right-side out and use as a reusable bag!

name: Painted Rock Garden Markers
description: Label herbs or plants with cute painted rocks.
instructions: Clean and dry rocks.
Paint base colors and let dry.
Write plant names with marker.

name: Tin Can Lantern
description: Upcycle tins into starry outdoor lanterns.
instructions: Freeze water inside tin can to keep shape.
Hammer holes in a decorative pattern.
Paint and place a candle inside.

name: Chunky Crochet Coaster
description: A simple crochet circle that doubles as a cozy coaster.
instructions: Make a magic ring and crochet 8 double crochets.
Increase evenly around until flat.
Slip stitch to join and weave in ends.

name: Beginner Knit Headband
description: A cute headband using only knit and purl stitches.
instructions: Cast on 14 stitches.
Work in 1x1 rib (knit 1, purl 1) until approx. 18 inches.
Bind off and sew ends together.

name: Crochet Granny Square
description: Classic square motif—use for blankets or bags.
instructions: Start with a magic ring.
Chain 3 and work 2 double crochets, chain 2 for corner.
Repeat around to form a square, continue for 3-4 rounds.

name: Finger Knit Scarf
description: No needles needed — learn knitting using your hands!
instructions: Create a long chain using finger knitting.
Continue stitching until desired length.
Tie off ends securely.

name: Quick Crochet Scrunchie
description: Use any leftover yarn to make a cute scrunchie.
instructions: Single crochet around a hair elastic.
Add double crochet stitches to create ruffles.
Join and weave in ends.

name: Mini Knit Mug Cozy
description: Keep drinks warm with a small knit sleeve.
instructions: Cast on 12-16 stitches depending on mug.
Knit in stockinette or rib stitch until fits around mug.
Sew a button loop and attach button.

name: Pom Pom Garland
description: A festive garland made from pom poms.
instructions: Wrap yarn around hand or cardboard.
Tie center tightly and cut loops.
Fluff pom poms and string them together.

name: Watercolor Quote Art
description: Make inspirational art with minimal supplies.
instructions: Paint a soft watercolor background.
Let dry completely.
Write a quote over it with a marker.

name: Recycled Paper Beads
description: Turn old magazines into colorful jewelry beads.
instructions: Cut long triangle strips from magazine pages.
Roll tightly around a toothpick and glue end.
String together for bracelets or necklaces.

name: Crochet Plant Hanger
description: Display plants with a cute macrame-style crochet hanger.
instructions: Chain long straps and join in the round.
Work around creating mesh until pot fits.
Tie strands at the top for hanging.
